name: Deploy to Prod with Terraform

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - prod  # Ejecuta el workflow solo cuando se haga un push a la rama feature/add resources
  workflow_dispatch:  # Permite activar manualmente el pipeline

jobs:  
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest    
    
  
    steps:
      # 1. Configurar el repositorio
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      # 2. Configurar credenciales de AWS
      - name: Configure AWS credentials
        run: |
          mkdir -p ~/.aws          
          echo "[profile ${{ secrets.AWS_PROFILE }}]" > ~/.aws/config
          echo "region = eu-west-3" >> ~/.aws/config          
          echo "output = json" >> ~/.aws/config

          echo "[${{ secrets.AWS_PROFILE }}]" > ~/.aws/credentials
          echo "aws_access_key_id = ${{ secrets.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID }}" >> ~/.aws/credentials
          echo "aws_secret_access_key = ${{ secrets.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY }}" >> ~/.aws/credentials          
          echo "aws_session_token = ${{ secrets.AWS_SESSION_TOKEN }}" >> ~/.aws/credentials
        

      # 3. Instalar terraform
      - name: Install Terraform
        uses: hashicorp/setup-terraform@v2
        with:
          terraform_version: 1.10.0  # Cambia según la versión que necesites

      
      # 5. Verificar version Terraform
      - name: Verify Terraform version
        run: | 
          terraform --version     
      

      # 6. Configurar la clave SSH
      - name: Setup SSH key
        run: |
          mkdir -p ~/.ssh
          echo "${{ secrets.AWS_SSH_KEY }}" > ~/.ssh/my-aws-key.pem
          chmod 600 ~/.ssh/my-aws-key.pem
        
        env:
          aws_ssh_key: ${{ secrets.AWS_SSH_KEY }}              

          
      # 7. Diagnóstico del estado
      #- name: Check Terraform State
        #run: |
          #cd proyecto_final/modulo_wordpress
          #terraform state list  

      
      # 7. Terraform Plan
      - name: Terraform Plan
        run: |
          cd proyecto_final/modules
          terraform init
          terraform import aws_security_group.allow_ssh_mr1 sg-0b02cef49914fa3bd
          terraform import aws_security_group.allow_mysql_mr1 sg-01ff02089aeefc6c3
          terraform plan -out=tfplan

      # 8. Apply Plan (Requiere aprobación manual)
      - name: Apply Plan (Manual Approval Required)
        if: github.event_name == 'workflow_dispatch'
        run: |
          cd proyecto_final/modules
          terraform apply tfplan -auto-approve
